price: Na mmom obi a yεde ne Nwoma bεfa n’akyi ama no wͻ n’akyi no,
arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ وَرَآءَ ظَهۡرِهِۦ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā man ūtiya kitābahu warāa ẓahrihi
